channel.title: Problem windows 10
channel.description:
Hello there, i'm trying to install axoloti on a windows 10 pc, i used axoloti till last summer on a mac. now i would like to use it again but after that i install it and i try to connect it the program give me some errors. i searched in several topics but i'm not able to fix the errors. when i try to run some patch it gives me this error: Firmware version: 1.0.0.1, crc=0xE95BAC96, entrypoint=0x20011000 No devices in DFU mode detected. To bring Axoloti Core in DFU mode, remove power from Axoloti Core, and then connect the micro-USB port to your computer while holding button S1. The LEDs will stay off when in DFU mode. Saving preferences... preferences path : C:\Users\andrea ricci\Documents\axoloti\axoloti.prefs Control transfer failed: -1 Ping: WaitSync Timeout, disconnecting now Disconnect request USB device found connected Authentic Axoloti Core file error: FR_NO_FILE, filename:"/START.BIN" Firmware version: 1.0.0.1, crc=0xE95BAC96, entrypoint=0x20011000 Using controller object: s1 Unable to created controller for : s1 Generate code complete Creating directory on sdcard : /02_keyboard_controlled_sine_oscillator Done creating directory Changing working directory on sdcard : /02_keyboard_controlled_sine_oscillator Done changing working directory Start compiling patch "make" non Š riconosciuto come comando interno o esterno, un programma eseguibile o un file batch. shell task failed, exit value: 1 Compiling patch failed ( C:\Users\andrea ricci\Documents\axoloti\axoloti-factory\patches\tutorials\02_keyboard_controlled_sine_oscillator.axp )
if i try to do "flash(rescue)" but it gives me this error: file error: FR_NO_FILE, filename:"/START.BIN" Firmware version: 1.0.0.1, crc=0xE95BAC96, entrypoint=0x20011000 Using controller object: s1 Unable to created controller for : s1 Generate code complete Creating directory on sdcard : /02_keyboard_controlled_sine_oscillator Done creating directory Changing working directory on sdcard : /02_keyboard_controlled_sine_oscillator Done changing working directory Start compiling patch "make" non Š riconosciuto come comando interno o esterno, un programma eseguibile o un file batch. shell task failed, exit value: 1 Compiling patch failed ( C:\Users\andrea ricci\Documents\axoloti\axoloti-factory\patches\tutorials\02_keyboard_controlled_sine_oscillator.axp ) No devices in DFU mode detected. To bring Axoloti Core in DFU mode, remove power from Axoloti Core, and then connect the micro-USB port to your computer while holding button S1. The LEDs will stay off when in DFU mode.
i read somewhere that could be a problem with the cable but i'm using the same cable that i was using months ago. can you please help me?

item.title: Problem windows 10
item.dc:creator: @andreari andrea ricci
item.description:
@andreari wrote:

Hello there,
i'm trying to install axoloti on a windows 10 pc, i used axoloti till last summer on a mac. now i would like to use it again but after that i install it and i try to connect it the program give me some errors. i searched in several topics but i'm not able to fix the errors. when i try to run some patch it gives me this error:
Firmware version: 1.0.0.1, crc=0xE95BAC96, entrypoint=0x20011000
No devices in DFU mode detected. To bring Axoloti Core in DFU mode, remove power from Axoloti Core, and then connect the micro-USB port to your computer while holding button S1. The LEDs will stay off when in DFU mode.
Saving preferences...
preferences path : C:\Users\andrea ricci\Documents\axoloti\axoloti.prefs
Control transfer failed: -1
Ping: WaitSync Timeout, disconnecting now
Disconnect request
USB device found
connected
Authentic Axoloti Core
file error: FR_NO_FILE, filename:"/START.BIN"
Firmware version: 1.0.0.1, crc=0xE95BAC96, entrypoint=0x20011000
Using controller object: s1
Unable to created controller for : s1
Generate code complete
Creating directory on sdcard : /02_keyboard_controlled_sine_oscillator
Done creating directory
Changing working directory on sdcard : /02_keyboard_controlled_sine_oscillator
Done changing working directory
Start compiling patch
"make" non Š riconosciuto come comando interno o esterno,
un programma eseguibile o un file batch.
shell task failed, exit value: 1
Compiling patch failed ( C:\Users\andrea ricci\Documents\axoloti\axoloti-factory\patches\tutorials\02_keyboard_controlled_sine_oscillator.axp )

if i try to do "flash(rescue)" but it gives me this error: file error: FR_NO_FILE, filename:"/START.BIN"
Firmware version: 1.0.0.1, crc=0xE95BAC96, entrypoint=0x20011000
Using controller object: s1
Unable to created controller for : s1
Generate code complete
Creating directory on sdcard : /02_keyboard_controlled_sine_oscillator
Done creating directory
Changing working directory on sdcard : /02_keyboard_controlled_sine_oscillator
Done changing working directory
Start compiling patch
"make" non Š riconosciuto come comando interno o esterno,
un programma eseguibile o un file batch.
shell task failed, exit value: 1
Compiling patch failed ( C:\Users\andrea ricci\Documents\axoloti\axoloti-factory\patches\tutorials\02_keyboard_controlled_sine_oscillator.axp )
No devices in DFU mode detected. To bring Axoloti Core in DFU mode, remove power from Axoloti Core, and then connect the micro-USB port to your computer while holding button S1. The LEDs will stay off when in DFU mode.

i read somewhere that could be a problem with the cable but i'm using the same cable that i was using months ago.
can you please help me?

Read full topic
